Work is in progress to set up this group.

Goals:
* Promote Ubuntu throughout the sate
* Encourage local manufacturers to support Ubuntu
* Hold release parties at local retailers
* Prove that North Dakota is *nix capable
* Be a resource for local Linux and Ubuntu questions
